name: Polo Shirt
description: Add a pop of color to your wardrobe with this vibrant yellow polo shirt. Featuring a distinctive and eye-catching design, this shirt is adorned with colorful graphics that include red, blue, and white elements.

name: Classic Comfort Polo
description: Infuse your wardrobe with a burst of color with this lively yellow polo shirt. Its unique and striking design is highlighted by vibrant graphics in shades of red, blue, and white.

name: Urban Chic Polo
description: Elevate your style with this classic white Polo Ralph Lauren t-shirt and a striking red and black vertical stripe. Perfect for a sharp, sporty look

name: Sporty Elegance Polo
description: Stand out with this vibrant green Polo shirt. Its classic fit offers a contemporary twist for any casual occasion.

name: Timeless Style Polo
description: Add a pop of color to your wardrobe with this classic white Polo Ralph Lauren t-shirt, featuring a vibrant, rainbow-colored logo. Made with high-quality fabric, this t-shirt combines comfort with the iconic style of the Polo brand.
